          <title>
            <string language="sl">Širjenje rimske države - trditve</string>
            <string language="en">Expansion of roman empire - statements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion des römischen Reiches - Anweisungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expansion de l'empire romain - rapports</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expansão do império roman - indicações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansione dell'impero romano - istruzione</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Extensión del imperio romano - declaraciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ugotavljanje pravilnosti trditev povezanih s širitvijo rimske države.</string>
            <string language="en">Determining the correctness of statements related to the expansion of the roman empire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rim</string>
            <string language="en">rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trditev</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">širjenje</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bestimmung der Korrektheit von Anweisungen 
stand auf der Expansion des römischen Reiches in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La détermination de l'exactitude des rapports a 
associé à l'expansion de l'empire romain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinar a exatidão das indicações 
relacionou-se à expansão do império roman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La determinazione della precisione delle 
istruzione si è riferita all'espansione dell'impero romano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθοριστικός την ακρίβεια των δηλώσεων σχετικών με την
επέκταση της ρωμαϊκής αυτοκρατορίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La determinación de la corrección de 
declaraciones se relacionó con la extensión del imperio romano.</string>
          </description>
